Articles.Content:
Wasn\'t sure if this is the right place for this, but I wrote a short creepypasta about Kerbal Space Program in the hopes that some people will read it and become interested in the game. Tell me what you think!

http://creepypasta.wikia.com/wiki/Jebediah%27s_Vision_-_Kerbal_Space_Program_Pasta
Dude that freaks me out a little. That makes it more interesting 8)
Looks like you\'ve been visited by the collective spirit of every Jeb who everyone has killed.
Very cool! You should put this in the KSP fan fiction section, though.
